text: Gérson Rodrigues Côrtes (30 November 1943 - 22 September 2020) was a Brazilian soul funk singer-songwriter. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. He began his career in performing on the variety program Hoje é Dia de Rock. He founded and performed in the 1960s musical group Formula 7. He was also a key person in the 1970s counterculture movent Black Rio. Côrtes died on 22 September 2020 in Rio de Janeiro from diabetes-related problems, aged 76.Gerson King Combo, cantor pioneiro do soul e funk, morre aos 76 anos ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian singer- songwriters Category:Singers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Writers from Rio de Janeiro
